briefTitle: Intelligent Remote Intervention for High-risk Breast Cancer Populations
officialTitle: Assessment of the Effect of Intelligence Remote Intervention on High-Risk Populations for Breast Cancer
conditions: Ultrasonography, Breast Neoplasm Female, Breast Carcinoma, Health Education
primaryOutcomeMeasure: BI-RADS grade changes in breast nodules
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female; Age\>=18; Having breast BI-RADS 3 nodules or higher; Informed consent signed.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Having any other known breast diseases; Having any major malignant diseases; Having no access to the remote devices or don't know how to use them.
